room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: "The Legend of Atlantis" was my first escape room ever. Wonderful. The design and staging of the room are amazing! So beautiful! It was so much fun and I would love to go back and try out "Christmas is Cancelled."

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: My wife and I did our 21st room together and chose the Atlatis. It was amazing and soo much fun! One of the best in the area!! We loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: Absolutely amazing! We just did The Legend of Atlantis! You have to do it! My husband and I decided it would be a fun family Easter event. The staff was wonderful and assisted us with putting our kids Easter baskets at the end for them to find! The 4 of us finished with 34 seconds left! They were completely surprised! We had so much fun! We can't wait to do the Christmas one!

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: The Atlantis Adventure was great - the props, puzzles and special effects were extremely well done. And we got just the right amount of help when we used our clues. Pleased to say we made it out, but just barely in time! Can't wait to try another one!

room_title: Escape room "The Legend of Atlantis" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: It truly is the little things, other escape rooms have a lot of rules about what you can and can't touch, and will talk over the sound speakers the whole time. This escape room is different because there are no wasted details. Everything is meant to be used. The technical aspect is wonderful as well. Most escape rooms are all combination locks and keys. Backstage escape has puzzles that do more than tell you the number order, actually unlocking hidden doors upon completion. Overall a great experience.
